price: 77. Mpe babomaki nâqah(1) mpe basalaki lolendo na mibeko mia Nkolo wa bango, mpe balobi: Eh! Swâlih! Yela biso maye ozali kolaka biso soki ozali solo kati ya batindami.
arabic: فَعَقَرُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةَ وَعَتَوۡاْ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَقَالُواْ يَٰصَٰلِحُ ٱئۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
footnotes: 1  Bótala na suratu oyo na mokapo: 73.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: faʿaqarū al-nāqata waʿataw ʿan amri rabbihim waqālū yāṣāliḥu i'tinā bimā taʿidunā in kunta mina al-mur'salīna
